statements: SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_id, progress FROM user_progress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT user_id, achievement FROM user_progress WHERE challenge_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, progress, challenge_id FROM user_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT user_id, achievement FROM user_progress WHERE user_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE challenge_id = 1 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT user_id, achievement FROM user_progress WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT challenge_id, COUNT(user_id) AS num_users FROM user_progress GROUP BY challenge_id HAVING num_users > 3;
SELECT user_id, SUM(progress) AS total_progress FROM user_progress WHERE achievement LIKE '%gold%' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT achievement FROM user_progress WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, challenge_id, progress FROM user_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_achievements WHERE achievement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, achievement_id, achievement_description FROM user_achievements WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, achievement_date FROM user_achievements ORDER BY achievement_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, progress, completion_time FROM user_progress WHERE completion_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC, progress ASC
SELECT user_id, achievement_id, achievement_date FROM user_achievements WHERE achievement_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY achievement_date ASC, user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, progress FROM user_progress WHERE progress >= 50 ORDER BY progress DESC, user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, achievement_id, achievement_description FROM user_achievements WHERE achievement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC, achievement_id DESC
SELECT user_id, progress, completion_time FROM user_progress WHERE completion_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY completion_time DESC, user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM UserProgress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT user_id, progress FROM UserProgress WHERE challenge_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM Achievements WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ARChallenges WHERE challenge_difficulty = 'Easy';
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM ARChallenges WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM UserProgress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT user_id, progress FROM UserProgress WHERE challenge_id = 1 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, a.achievement_name, a.achievement_date FROM Achievements a JOIN UserProgress u ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, c.challenge_name, c.challenge_difficulty FROM ARChallenges c JOIN UserProgress u ON c.challenge_id = u.challenge_id ORDER BY c.challenge_difficulty DESC;
SELECT AVG(progress) AS average_progress, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM UserProgress;
SELECT * FROM user_progress;
SELECT user_id, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM user_achievements WHERE achievement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty_level FROM ar_challenges ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, analysis_date, time_spent_minutes FROM user_analysis WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, challenge_id, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM user_achievements WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_challenges WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY challenge_category ASC;
SELECT user_id, analysis_date, time_spent_minutes FROM user_analysis WHERE time_spent_minutes > 60;
SELECT user_id, achievement_name, challenge_name FROM user_achievements JOIN ar_challenges ON user_achievements.user_id = ar_challenges.challenge_id;
SELECT * FROM user_progress;
SELECT user_id, progress FROM user_progress WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_type FROM ar_challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty > 3;
SELECT u.user_id, ua.achievement_description FROM user_achievements ua JOIN user_tracking u ON ua.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT analysis_id, user_id, challenge_id FROM analysis_data ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty > 2 ORDER BY challenge_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, challenge_id, progress FROM user_progress WHERE progress > 0.5 AND completion_date IS NOT NULL;

SELECT user_id, challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM ar_challenges JOIN user_tracking ON ar_challenges.challenge_id = user_tracking.challenge_id WHERE user_tracking.start_date < '2023-01-01' AND user_tracking.end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, achievement_description FROM user_achievements JOIN user_progress ON user_achievements.challenge_id = user_progress.challenge_id WHERE user_progress.progress = 1;
SELECT user_id, challenge_id, analysis_result FROM analysis_data JOIN user_progress ON analysis_data.challenge_id = user_progress.challenge_id WHERE user_progress.progress < 0.3;
